name: A Shoot The Pumpkin Game - Scary Fun & Spooky Halloween Games
name_original: A Shoot The Pumpkin Game - Scary Fun & Spooky Halloween Games
description:
** 100% FREE! EVERYTHING UNLOCKED! **
** SPOOKY & FUN HALLOWEEN GAME! **

Get ready for a spooky, scary halloween game! In this game, you play Dracula, who is showing Frankenstein and the other evil creatures from halloween just how good you are with a bow and arrow. So good in fact, that you asked Frankenstein to place a pumpkin on his head. Now it's up to you to shoot the pumpkin.

Just don't shoot Frankenstein!
